messages.subject: Re: u deserve some sort of medal
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/2/00 4:50:35 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/2/00 4:50:35 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com writes:

<< Once I felt the squishy carpet (10 feet down the hall) and
discovered the ocean of water streaming out of the bathroom down the hallway
and into the heating ducts, I was a screaming zombie!!!! The water ruined
the subflooring, carpet and pad (throughout 3/4 of the house), ductwork and
swelled the doorjambs and drywall. The damage was over 5 thousand dollars. >>

tiffany,
you have earned the right to brag about surviving that one! whew. it
probably goes a long way toward making a lot of us feel thankful that (so
far) our spilled milk isnt all that bad...
erin
